intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce their insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their current insurance is too expensive or when exploring new policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to showcase cost-saving calculators or simulators.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded tools.

intents.user_motivation: Users want clarity on complex insurance terms and rules.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are confused about policy terms or legal requirements.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's expertise in simplifying financial concepts for European customers.
intents.content_format_recommendation: FAQs with clear explanations and examples.

intents.sub_intent: common mistakes to avoid with insurance
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid costly errors when dealing with insurance.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are new to insurance or have had negative past experiences.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Position ING as a trusted advisor by offering proactive guidance.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Checklist or guide with do's and don'ts.

intents.sub_intent: how to choose the best insurance plan
intents.user_motivation: Users want to compare options and make an informed decision.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are actively shopping for insurance.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Showcase ING's digital comparison tools and personalized recommendations.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Interactive comparison tool with expert insights.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
common mistakes to avoid with insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can highlight its digital tools and customer-centric approach to simplify cost-saving strategies.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive guide or hub focused on reducing insurance costs, including tools, tips, and case studies.

sub_intents: how to choose the best insurance plan
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Leverage ING's reputation for simplifying complex financial topics and providing transparent advice.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop educational content series with videos, infographics, and FAQs to demystify insurance concepts.
